alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron and south central Willacy Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 550 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rio Hondo Elementary School, or near Rio Hondo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, Rio Hondo, Arroyo City, Harlingen Soccer Complex, Lozano, Harlingen Fire Department, Rio Hondo City Hall, Treasure Hills Elementary School, Treasure Hills Golf Club and Rio Hondo Elementary School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy
